title: STAT+: A biotech incubator in China tries to unlock innovation — alongside drugmakers worldwide
description: ATLATL, one of China’s leading biotech incubators, is seeking to bridge East-West innovation and tap into China's rapidly maturing sector.
content: ATLATL, one of China’s leading biotech incubators, is seeking to bridge East-West innovation and tap into China's rapidly maturing sector.
